title: Zach Eliason
text:
I am a bioinformatician interested in:

🦠 cancer immunology
𑗊 geometric machine learning
🏥 translational research
🤖 deep learning
🧬 genetics

I have expertise in a variety of coding tools and languages (Python, AI/ML, PyTorch, R, C++, scripting/automation, AWS cloud computing, database management, version control, web programming), domain knowledge in genetics and immunology, and am proficient in design software (Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign).
